author: RT
title: RT - Daily news: What the truck? US president looks like something from Mad Max in #TrumpTruck meme (PHOTOS)
text:
What the truck? US president looks like something from Mad Max in #TrumpTruck meme (PHOTOS) Published time: 25 Mar, 2017 10:53 Get short URL The image was taken on the White House lawn. Â© Carlos Barria / Reuters Donald Trump may have failed to pass his healthcare bill, but if laughter truly is the best medicine, his healing powers are in full swing. An image of the president in the driverâ€™s seat of a semi truck has snowballed into the latest meme. ok what punk band wants to claim this as an album cover? pic.twitter.com/NNAW2lqeJM â€” Dan Ozzi (@danozzi) March 23, 2017 
The photograph was taken on the White House lawn as US President Donald Trump met with representatives from the trucking industry. Trump tweeted the video, in which his delight of sitting in the driverâ€™s seat of a truck is clearly evident, inviting the internet to do its worst. It was an honor to welcome so many truckers and trucking industry leaders to the @WhiteHouse today! pic.twitter.com/M1veooVBNE â€” Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) March 23, 2017 
Comparisons to films like Mad Max followed, and soon the #TrumpTruck meme was born. â€” Devan Coggan (@devancoggan) March 23, 2017 "Well it looks like ol' Boss Trump learned them Duke boys are slicker than a sow's underside. But that's how it goes here in Hazzard county" pic.twitter.com/Jz2J7ny1cU â€” Dave Itzkoff (@ditzkoff) March 23, 2017 
While some settled for cinematic comparisons, others applied their Photoshop skills to make Trump look as ridiculous as possible. Others used the opportunity to poke fun at Trumpâ€™s failure to replace Obamacare, placing him and Paul Ryan in the driverâ€™s seat in the climactic scene from Thelma and Louise. Got him a more appropriate ride. #TrumpTruck pic.twitter.com/WBc0ariDnd â€” Jake Akuna (@jakeakuna) March 24, 2017 Don in this tiny car is my new fav thing ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ #Trumptruck pic.twitter.com/u2V7Qx3hps
